posts.title: Delicious Homemade Pasta
posts.postDrescription: Just made my own homemade pasta from scratch for the first time! Used a traditional recipe with flour and eggs. The result was amazing. Can't believe I made it myself!

posts.title: Personal Best in 5K Run!
posts.postDrescription: Set a new personal record in my 5K run today! Finished in 22 minutes, breaking my previous record by 1 minute. Hard work and consistent training pay off!,

posts.title: Captured a Scenic Landscape
posts.postDrescription: Spent the afternoon drawing a beautiful landscape. Added vibrant colors and focused on capturing the details. So proud of how it turned out!

posts.title: Visited most lively city in the planet
posts.postDrescription: üéâ‚ú® Celebrated the arrival of the New Year at the iconic Eiffel Tower! üóºü•Ç Grateful for the opportunity to start the year in such a magical place. The dazzling lights, the energetic atmosphere, and the company of amazing people made it an unforgettable experience. Here's to new beginnings, adventures, and the journey ahead! üåü Wishing everyone a year filled with joy, growth, and exciting discoveries. Cheers to 2023! üéáüçæ

posts.title: Launched My First Mobile App
posts.postDrescription: After months of coding and testing, I finally launched my first mobile app! It's a productivity tool to help users stay organized. Excited to see it in action!

posts.title: Started raising cattle
posts.postDrescription: Started raising cattle at Ko'olau Ranch on Kauai, and my goal is to create some of the highest quality beef in the world. The cattle are wagyu and angus, and they'll grow up eating macadamia meal and drinking beer that we grow and produce here on the ranch. We want the whole process to be local and vertically integrated. Each cow eats 5,000-10,000 pounds of food each year, so that's a lot of acres of macadamia trees. My daughters help plant the mac trees and take care of our different animals. We're still early in the journey and it's fun improving on it every season. Of all my projects, this is the most delicious.

posts.title: I'll be co-leading the subproject 'We The (Social) Media: Social Media by and for Social Movements' with Andreas Breiter, Sebastian Haunss, and Stephanie Geise
posts.postDrescription: I'll be co-leading the subproject 'We The (Social) Media: Social Media by and for Social Movements' with Andreas Breiter, Sebastian Haunss, and Stephanie GeiseThe University of Bremen, in close collaboration with the U Bremen Research Alliance and other partners, is establishing a data competence center for the entire region. The Bundesministerium f√ºr Bildung und Forschung (Federal Ministry of Education and Research) is supporting the establishment of the center with over 3.5 million euros.

posts.title: I just started my research stay at the Aviz research group
posts.postDrescription: A bit late but I'm happy to report that I just started my research stay at the Aviz research group at Inria with the support of the DAAD German Academic Exchange Service. I will be working on multi-user interaction with wall displays, and look forward to the collaborations and life around hashtag#Paris in the next months

posts.title: My paper titled 'Towards More Effective AI-Assisted Programming' has been published at ICSE SEIP 2023
posts.postDrescription: Exciting news! üéâ My paper titled 'Towards More Effective AI-Assisted Programming' has been published at ICSE SEIP 2023. Grateful for the opportunity to contribute to the field of AI and programming. Huge thanks to everyone who supported me on this journey!

posts.title: I have passed my B1 exam of German language
posts.postDrescription: I have passed my B1 exam of German language with a very good result. 7 months of hard work paid off finally. Alhamdulillah üòç Time to learn B2.
